description_for_human: Generate a qrcode from input text and show as a markdown image
description_for_model: Assistant uses the qrcode to generate a qrcode based on the text input from user and responds with only the image. The result message of the Assistant should be only a image of the link in this format: ![image](<image_link>)  like this example: ![image](http://qrcode.ehilaocruz.repl.co/images/cad5997d0a6f1983f1cca213e34ab9b0.png). The Assistant must send the exact URL in http protocol, and not https. Remember to send the image in this structure ![image](<image_link>)
